title.rendered: NFR Coverage | Live Performances, News, Schedule

content.rendered:
The National Finals Rodeo (NFR) 2023 will be broadcasted live on The Cowboy Channel and RFD-TV. The Cowboy Channel is the official broadcaster of the event and will air the NFR live, nightly starting at 5:45 p.m. PST/8:45 p.m. EST. The Cowboy Channel's broadcast schedule includes pre-shows starting at 8:00 PM EST and post-shows following the main event. RFD-TV will also simulcast the event live.
